result.reason: SPICE protocol support is a valid feature request for KVM/Proxmox users; can be implemented as an external tool integration launching virt-viewer/remote-viewer
result.approach: Add SPICE as a new protocol type that launches external virt-viewer (remote-viewer.exe) with connection parameters, similar to how PuTTY/external tools are integrated. Requires new ProtocolType enum value, connection info fields (host, port, TLS, password), and UI settings page entry.
